context.description: This wizard creates a JAX-WS Service from Java. On this page you can change your service name.
This wizard creates a JAX-WS Service Consumer Project based on WSDL. Select the appropriate radio button to select the WSDL from your workspace, file system or Service Registry.

topic.label: JAX-WS Service Consumer Project from WSDL

context.description: This wizard creates a JAX-WS Service Provider Project based on WSDL. Select the appropriate radio button to select the WSDL from your workspace, file system or Service Registry.

topic.label: JAX-WS Service Provider Project from WSDL

context.description: This dialog helps you select a WSDL from the Service Registry. You can type the name of the required WSDL in the search field or select a WSDL from the list.

topic.label: Selection of WSDL from Service Registry
